Actions.Name: Ancient Bolt
Actions.Effects: Foes in the line are electrified. Electrified characters take 2 damage, once, for every adjacent character.

Actions.Name: Root Lash
Actions.Effects: A character in range 4 from a root summon or a deep root takes [fray] damage, then must save or be shoved as far as possible towards that root, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Ancient Dagon
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters in the area take [fray] damage.
Actions.Delay: The hob's next turn must be slow but at the start of that turn, a freezing weapon made of water coalesces at the end of the line, repeating the area. Characters in the area take [D]+[fray].

Actions.Name: Summon Root
Actions.Description: The Wissan creates a lesser root in a free space in range 6.

Summons.Name: Lesser Root
Tags: Immune to all damage and effects
SummonEffects: The root emits aura 1 around it. Foes in the aura are vulnerable+.
When a root is summoned, deal 1 damage, once, to any character in range 2 for every lesser root or deep root in range 2 of that character, including this one.
